Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameLobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameLobby
public class GameLobby
extends java.lang.Object
Class that supports the initial phase of the game It is a lobby for the players that are connected It is used to access the model only when all players are connected and ready to play

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(PlayerIndex playerIndex, java.lang.String playerNick)
      Add a player in the lobby
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - index of the player to add
      playerNick - nickName of the player to add
      Throws:
      MaxPlayersException - if lobby is already full
      NameAlreadyTakenException - if the nickname chosen is not available
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the player is already in the lobby

      Parameters:
      nickName - is the nickname to check
      Returns:
      true iff the nick given is already chosen by other plaeyrs
